text: Larry David at the 2009 Tribeca Film Festival Larry David is an American comedian, writer, actor, director, and television producer. He and Jerry Seinfeld created the television series Seinfeld, of which David was the head writer and executive producer for the first seven seasons. David gained further recognition for the HBO series Curb Your Enthusiasm, which he created and stars in as a semi-fictionalized version of himself. David has written or co-written every episode of Curb Your Enthusiasm since its pilot episode in 1999. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" |- " ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
